sense.def:
To share something with another person
pomeni nekaj uporabljati ali doživeti skupaj z nekom drugim.

seg.quote: Ralph went upstairs to the room he shared with his brother.
Both partners share in rearing their family.

sense.def:
To share a thought or piece of news with someone
pomeni povedati nekomu, kaj mislimo ali kaj smo izvedeli.

seg.quote: He was so excited about his idea that he felt he had to share it with someone.

sense.def:
Kadar dve osebi ali stvari
share a particular quality, characteristic, or idea
, jima je skupna določena lastnost, značilnost ali ideja.

seg.quote: This was a taste which he shared with Guy.

sense.def:
To have or do a share of something
pomeni imeti ali narediti del nečesa.

seg.quote: ...a campaign for parents to have a share in discussing school policy.
An increasing share of the work is handed over to computers.

sense.def:
The shares of a company
so enaki deli, na katere je razdeljeno lastništvo podjetja. Take lastniške dele lahko kupujemo in tako vlagamo svoj denar.

To share something out
pomeni dati vsakemu članu neke skupine enak ali pošten del nečesa.
